name: phonebook-serv

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack-mooc/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fs-mooc-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Lauri Niskanen, Annika Sneck, Akseli Jaara
